text:
@tellenby @JoeWStanley @NFUEastMidlands @clamidlands @EnvAgency @NWLEnviro @CoalvillePolice @ABridgen @DefraGovUK I will never understand the mindset of someone who thinks chucking their rubbish anywhere they like is ok, whatever their feeling of entitlement.

Perhaps it is only the minority, but more access to the rural parts of our nation must come with increased responsibility.

text: @JoeWStanley @HillFT @NFUEastMidlands @clamidlands @EnvAgency @NWLEnviro @CoalvillePolice @ABridgen @DefraGovUK The fly tippers do not fear anyone or anything. The run rings around the authorities. It is multiple million pound criminal industry. They can be very violent too.@NFUPolitical @AdamAfriyie @joymorrissey @theresa_may @ThamesVP @10DowningStreet

@ThanetCouncil @filthythanet @EnvAgencySE Also according to the landlord he pays you to collect and we pay our council tax so you are paid twice to collect our bins. We should be refunded for every missed collection. Which amounts to about 50% of the time

@ThanetCouncil @filthythanet @EnvAgencySE Thank you. I shouldn’t have to keep reporting missed bins. The surrounding properties were all done. And there was nothing blocking the road or access to the bin store.

They block sewage pipes and can harm our wildlife.
